buildings.headline: Research House No. 1 was built from prefabricated concrete parts and has external insulation. A dispersion putty and paint were used as the interior coating.
buildings.text: Due to the high storage mass, the house showed very good heat storage behaviour and, in combination with the thermal insulation used, offered good protection against overheating in summer and against rapid cooling down in winter. The relatively low storage capacity of the inner coating resulted in low moisture buffering.

parameters.parameter_name: Protection against overheating in the summer
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a higher protection against overheating of the interior in summer.
A higher value means a more stable temperature.
A higher value means the wall can regulate the humidity better.

parameters.parameter_name: Fluctuation of the inner surface temperature
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A lower value means a more balanced indoor temperature feeling.
A higher value means better protection against outdoor noise.
A higher value means better acoustics due to better protection against echo.

parameters.parameter_name: Absorption of high frequency electromagnetic fields
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a better protection against the most common mobile frequencies.
A lower value means less noticeable odour
200 visitors rated the individual research houses according to their subjective feelings and subjective level of comfort

products.name: Baumit StarContact white
products.additional_name: Top quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar
products.description: Top quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar with white cement, especially for Baumit StarSystems. Complying, with a high degree of safety, to all parameters required by ETAG 004. Very flexible, extremely weather-resistant, with excellent workability, guaranteeing long lasting performance. Formulated for demanding applications, weather conditions during processing and demanding substrates.
products.experts_advice_2: Create the reinforcement layer by applying 10 mm adhesive mortar with a notched trowel to the substrate. Press vertical strips of Baumit StarTex fibre-glass mesh into the fresh mortar with 10 cm overlap and then (or after applying additional material) smooth the surface. The reinforcement must not be visible. Reinforcement layer thickness min. 3 mm, max. 6 mm.
products.experts_advice: Baumit StarContact adhesive mortar can also be used for bonding and mortaring plinth XPS and EPS Perimeter insulation panels.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Highly flexible cement adhesive mortar suitable for bonding and mortaring all insulation panels.
products.product_benefit_2_description: The façade plaster can be applied directly on the reinforced layer.
products.product_benefit_3_description: With excellent applicability, with guaranteed long life and rapid curing period.
products.sd_value: app. 0.15 m for a layer thickness of 3 mm

videos.title: Application: Installing Anchors on Mineral Wool Insulation

products.name: Baumit StarTherm Resolution
products.additional_name: Facade insulation board with extremely high thermal insulation
products.description: Facade insulation board with extremely high thermal insulation capabilities. Phenolic foam based core covered on both sides with 3mm thick grey EPS-F. Offers the possibility to grind the surface of the board to equalize any unevenness during installation. Especially for window openings, etc. Thickness 50 - 300 mm. Both sides covered with grey EPS-F.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Even small thicknesses of insulation ensure high thermal insulation properties, and also save the space.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Ideal at insulations where high thicknesses of common insulation are considered.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Effective thicknesses of insulation do not increase the thickness of window reveal, and so more light gets inside.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: Standard colour shade white, dyeing acc. table
products.description: Ready-to-use, universally usable primer to equalize absorption and acts as bonding agent for all Baumit ETIC- and plaster systems. The added grain makes it easier to apply and structure all top coats. Can be colored - see product data sheet for detailed information.
products.experts_advice_2: If necessary, for instance in case of very hot weather, consistency of the prime coat can be modified by adding of 5% water, max. 1 l water/25 kg bucket. An excessive dilution of the paint can cause “chalking” of the surface.
products.experts_advice: Before application of Baumit PremiumPrimer, carefully mix, and overall apply on the substrate by a roller or a paintbrush evenly without any interruption. Curing time min. 24 hrs.

products.color_text: Selected colour shades from Life Colored by Baumit
products.description: Protection and enhancement of façades and façade surfaces over old and new mineral plasters and fillers, on concrete, when preserving historical monuments, during renovations and as a topcoat with Baumit External Wall Insulation Systems open, KlimaFacade, EPS, Mineral and MineralSchaum and on renovation renders.

products.product_benefit_1_description: Unique self-cleaning façade render suitable for all façades including thermal insulation systems.
products.product_benefit_2_description: The highly vapour-permeable surface of the plaster is microscopically smooth and resistant to contaminant deposits.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Thanks to new Nanopor Photokat technology, the façade has increased protection against organic dirt.

products.name: Baumit Finish
products.additional_name: Ready-to-use, matt, colorless seal for use with Bamit Lasur paint. Also suitable for dilution of Lasur.
products.color_text: transparent
products.description: Ready to use, matt, colourless seal for use with Baumit Lasur paint. Also suitable for dilution of Lasur.
products.experts_advice_2: This top coat for Baumit Lasur increases weather resistance.
products.experts_advice: In order to improve long-term weather resistance in the case of unevenly applied or too thinly applied Baumit Lasur decorative coating, use Baumit Finish.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Transparent coat for sealing Baumit Lasur surface coat in exposed spots.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Baumit Finish is prepared for immediate use without added water.
products.drying_time: max. 12 h depending on the glazing technique; the drying time can be longer at low temperatures and high humidity!

seo.title: Baumit Finish
seo.description: Ready-to-apply, transparent sealant for Baumit Lasur.

products.name: Baumit Divina Classic
products.description: Interior paint with good processing properties and good coverage. Processing: roller, brush, airless spray. Breathable, odorless drying, tested for  harmful substances. Available colored in the Baumit Life shades with the last digit 7, 8 and 9. Wet abrasion class: 3; Opacity: 2 at 7 m² / l; Degree  of gloss: dull matt. 1 liter ≙ approx. 1.6 kilograms.
products.experts_advice_2: Store securely sealed and in a cool and frost-free location. Can be stored unopened, in the original container, for 12 months.
products.experts_advice: Baumit Divina Classic may, in keeping with the coating build-up, be dilluted with water up to a maximum of 5%.

seo.title: Baumit Divina Classic
seo.description: Breathable interior dispersion paint with good coverage, in E.L.F. quality. Can be tinted with alkali-resistant solid colours or basic and tinting colours.

headline_t.int: Research House No. 1 was built from prefabricated concrete parts and has external insulation. A dispersion putty and paint were used as the interior coating.
headline_t.si: Vzorčna hiša 1 - betonske stene prebarvane z notranjo barvo.

text_t.int: Due to the high storage mass, the house showed very good heat storage behaviour and, in combination with the thermal insulation used, offered good protection against overheating in summer and against rapid cooling down in winter. The relatively low storage capacity of the inner coating resulted in low moisture buffering.
text_t.si: Površina hiše ima visoko sposobnost shranjevanja toplote in relativno visoko stopnjo toplotne učinkovitosti. Toplotna kapaciteta hiše je bila ocenjena kot "visoka". Visoka stopnja toplotne učinkovitosti betona z zunanjo toplotna izolacijo nudita zaščito pred poletnim pregrevanjem. Sposobnost uravnavanja vlage je nizka, med drugim zaradi nizke absorpcijske zmogljivosti betona za shranjevanje vlage.

products.name: Baumit StarContact Light White
products.epim_name: StarContact Light / KlebeSpachtel Light / StarContact KBM Fix
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo, posebej pripravljeno za strojno nanašanje v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star, XS 022 in Nature. Zaradi lahkih dodatkov ima veliko izdatnost in je primerno za tankoslojni (3 mm), srednjeslojni (5 mm) in debeloslojni nanos (8 mm). Tankoslojni nanos je dovoljen samo v sistemu s ploščami iz EPS (ekspandiranega polistirena). Za lepljenje (na mineralnih podlagah) in kot osnovni omet za plošče za podzidek XPS TOP.
products.experts_advice_2: Lepila ne smemo nanašati na fasadne plošče iz EPS-a, ki so bile dalj časa (več kot 2 tedna) izpostavljene UV sevanju (porumenele ali obledele plošče). Plošče je potrebno obrusiti in odprašiti.
products.experts_advice_3: Pred vsakim nadaljnjim nanosom je potreben čas sušenja min. 1 dan (velja pri temperaturi zraka + 20°C in ≤ 70% vlagi). Posebej pomembno je, da je predhodni sloj enakomerno suh (brez temnih lis).
products.experts_advice: Armirni sloj lahko izvedemo kot tankoslojni (3 mm), srednjeslojni (5 mm) ali debeloslojni (8 mm) nanos.
products.consumption_info: This is a consumption info for the adm calcualtor

seo.title: Baumit StarContact Light White
seo.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo, posebej pripravljeno za strojno nanašanje v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star, XS 022 in Nature.

products.name: Baumit StarTherm XS 022  fasadne plošče XS 022
products.additional_name: izolacijske plošče iz penjenih smol PF
products.description: Fasadne izolacijske plošče iz PF (penjenih fenolnih smol) po SIST EN 13166, z najboljšimi toplotnoizolacijskimi lastnostmi, obojestransko kaširane s filcem iz steklenih vlaken. Sestavni del fasadnega sistema Baumit Star Resolution.
products.experts_advice_2: Nazivna debelina osnovnega ometa mora biti vsaj 5 mm (skupna debelina izravnalnega in armirnega sloja 7 - 8 mm), pri čemer je armirna mrežica vtisnjena v zunanjo tretjino lepila.
products.experts_advice_3: Pri izolaciji špalet oken in vrat morajo plošče na fasadi toliko segati preko roba zidu, da je po strditvi lepila možno tesno prileganje na stiku izolacije na špaleti.
products.experts_advice: Področja uporabe: prenove, novogradnje, stavbe do višine 22 m, zunanji zid, kletni strop. Idealen za: mansarde, dozidave, nizko-energijske hiše, špalete, lože, frčade.

seo.title: Baumit StarTherm XS 022  fasadne plošče XS 022
seo.description: Fasadne izolacijske plošče iz PF (penjenih fenolnih smol) po SIST EN 13166, z najboljšimi toplotnoizolacijskimi lastnostmi, obojestransko kaširane s filcem iz steklenih vlaken.

products.name: Baumit StarTex
products.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje osnovnih ometov v Baumit fasadnih sistemih.
products.experts_advice_2: V sveže nanešeno maso vtisnemo stekleno mrežico Baumit StarTex v navpičnih pasovih od zgoraj navzdol z najmanj 10 cm prekrivanjem in jo poravnamo z ravnim delom gladilke. Mrežica mora biti vsaj 1 mm (na stikih 0,5 mm) in max. 3 mm pokrita z lepilom.
products.experts_advice_3: Če vogale ojačamo z Baumit vogalniki, moramo mrežico vogalnikov v celoti vtopiti v lepilo. Če vogale ojačamo brez vogalnikov, izvedemo to med armiranjem površine. Pri tem mrežico potegnemo vsaj 20 cm preko vogala in jo s 10 cm prekrivanjem vtisnemo v lepilo.
products.experts_advice: Na vogalih oken in drugih odprtin pred nanosom armirnega sloja namestimo dodatne, diagonalno položene pasove steklene mrežice (velikost min. 20 x 30 cm).

seo.title: Baumit StarTex
seo.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje Baumit izravnalnih ometov, kot sestavni del Baumit fasadnih sistemov. Širina odprtin 4 mm.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: standardni beli barvni ton; 17 PremiumPrimer odtenkov po Life barvni karti
products.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavo vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino. Možnost obarvanja - gl. tehnični list.

seo.title: Baumit PremiumPrimer
seo.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavno vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino.

products.name: Baumit NanoporTop
products.color_text: izbrani barvni odtenki po barvni karti Life Colored by Baumit
products.description: Samočistilni, difuzijsko odprti, za umazanijo odklonilen zaključni omet na mineralni osnovi z nanokristalno površino za dolgotrajno svežo fasado.
products.experts_advice: Enakomernost barvnih odtenkov zagotovimo le, če uporabljamo pripravljene barvne omete iz ene proizvodne šarže. Na enakost barve vplivajo tudi: temperatura, vlažnost zraka, vpojnost podlage. Različne šarže pred nanosom medsebojno premešamo.

seo.title: Baumit NanoporTop
seo.description: Samočistilni paroprepustni pastozni zaključni omet z nanokristalno gladko površino. Posebno odklonilen za umazanijo.

products.name: Baumit Finish
products.color_text: prozorna
products.description: Nesijoča, transparentna raztopina za Lasur. Tudi kot transparentni premaz za dodatno zaščito Lasur.
products.experts_advice_2: Baumit Finish nanašamo z običajnim čopičem ali valjčkom na Baumit Lasur.
products.experts_advice_3: Baumit Finish ni potrebno redčiti z vodo.
products.experts_advice: Po nanosu Baumit Lasur na zunanjih in izpostavljenih notranjih (kuhinje, kopalnice) površinah je obvezen enkratni končni premaz z Baumit Finish.
products.drying_time: ca. 12 h (pri nižji temperaturi ali višji vlažnosti se lahko podaljša)

seo.title: Baumit Finish
seo.description: Pripravljena, nesijoča, transparentna raztopina za Lasur. Tudi kot transparentni premaz za dodatno zaščito Lasur.

products.name: Baumit StarContact Light White
products.epim_name: StarContact Light / KlebeSpachtel Light / StarContact KBM Fix
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo, posebej pripravljeno za strojno nanašanje v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star, XS 022 in Nature. Zaradi lahkih dodatkov ima veliko izdatnost in je primerno za tankoslojni (3 mm), srednjeslojni (5 mm) in debeloslojni nanos (8 mm). Tankoslojni nanos je dovoljen samo v sistemu s ploščami iz EPS (ekspandiranega polistirena). Za lepljenje (na mineralnih podlagah) in kot osnovni omet za plošče za podzidek XPS TOP.
products.experts_advice_2: Lepila ne smemo nanašati na fasadne plošče iz EPS-a, ki so bile dalj časa (več kot 2 tedna) izpostavljene UV sevanju (porumenele ali obledele plošče). Plošče je potrebno obrusiti in odprašiti.
products.experts_advice_3: Pred vsakim nadaljnjim nanosom je potreben čas sušenja min. 1 dan (velja pri temperaturi zraka + 20°C in ≤ 70% vlagi). Posebej pomembno je, da je predhodni sloj enakomerno suh (brez temnih lis).
products.experts_advice: Armirni sloj lahko izvedemo kot tankoslojni (3 mm), srednjeslojni (5 mm) ali debeloslojni (8 mm) nanos.
products.consumption_info: This is a consumption info for the adm calcualtor

seo.title: Baumit StarContact Light White
seo.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo, posebej pripravljeno za strojno nanašanje v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star, XS 022 in Nature.

buildings.headline: House No. 2 is comparable to Building No. 1 in terms of the wall construction. The biggest difference is the diffusion-open, mineral inner coating that is used there.
buildings.text: This ensured significantly better moisture regulation and contributed to a reduction in moisture peaks. This is due to the moisture penetration coefficient, which was significantly higher for this interior coating than for house No. 1. With regard to overheating in summer, it can be seen that the indoor temperatures in houses 1 and 2 were low in summer, which is due to the external thermal insulation and the high specific building wall masses.

parameters.parameter_name: Protection against overheating in the summer
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a higher protection against overheating of the interior in summer.
A higher value means a more stable temperature.
A higher value means the wall can regulate the humidity better.

parameters.parameter_name: Fluctuation of the inner surface temperature
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A lower value means a more balanced indoor temperature feeling.
A higher value means better protection against outdoor noise.
A higher value means better acoustics due to better protection against echo.

parameters.parameter_name: Absorption of high frequency electromagnetic fields
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a better protection against the most common mobile frequencies.
A lower value means less noticeable odour
200 visitors rated the individual research houses according to their subjective feelings and subjective level of comfort

products.name: Baumit openTherm
products.description: White, breathable facade insulating panels made from EPS (expanded polystyrene) specially designed for brickwork and similarly breathable masonry with very good thermal insulation properties. System component of Baumit open.
products.experts_advice_2: In the area of the base min. We recommend using XPS or EPS Perimeter non-absorbent insulation panels 30 cm over the terrain.
products.experts_advice: For bonding and mortaring we recommend using Baumit OpenContact adhesive mortar.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Insulation panel made from EPS for simple handling and application.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Ideal for insulating masonry with high vapour permability, such as porous concrete.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Part of the Baumit Open thermal insulation system for optimal interior temperature and pleasant living.

seo.title: Baumit openTherm
seo.description: White, breathable façade insulating panels made from EPS (expanded polystyrene) in accordance with ÖNORM EN 13163 (μ-value ≤ 10), specially designed for brickwork and similarly breathable mas

products.name: Baumit openContact
products.additional_name: Unique, high quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar
products.description: Unique, high quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar with white cement, especially for Baumit openSystem. Complying, with a high degree of safety, to all parameters required by ETAG 004. Highly vapor permeable, very flexible, extremely resistant to weathering featuring excellent workability. For objects with highest quality demands on indoor climate - for a house that breaths.
products.experts_advice_2: Generally speaking, the Baumit OpenContact system is used for thermal insulation anywhere where a thermal insulation system with a high level of water vapour permeability is required, and thus also for the thermal insulation of porous concrete block walls. We therefore recommend the specific evaluation of the thermal insulation recommendation for thermal insulation for the structure in question and that you take into account the specific type of porous concrete brick. Our colleagues at the Baumit Consultancy Centre will be happy to assist you in this regard.
products.experts_advice_3: Thanks to the white putty, you can easily check whether Baumit OpenContact was actually used on your façade!
products.experts_advice: On account of its good adhesive properties, Baumit OpenContact can be used for gluing (or smoothing) XPS insulating panels. N.B. in this case the high water vapour permeability of the material no longer applies.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Particularly suitable for structures with higher demands for interior quality.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Adhesive mortar for bonding and mortaring insulation panels in the Baumit Open system.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Exceptional quality adhesive mortar, highly flexible and with excellent workability.

seo.title: Baumit openContact
seo.description: Breathable, mineral-based, fibre-reinforced, white powder adhesive and plaster undercoat – specially developed for Baumit Open - KlimaFaçade.

products.product_benefit_2_description: Fibre-glass mesh resistant to the elements. Premium quality with Baumit applicator.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Wider bands allow les frequent movement of bands which reduces the consumption of the whole matrix.

products.description: Ready-to-use, universally usable primer to equalize absorption and acts as bonding agent for all Baumit ETIC- and plaster systems. The added grain makes it easier to apply and structure all top coats. Can be colored - see product data sheet for detailed information.
products.experts_advice_2: If necessary, for instance in case of very hot weather, consistency of the prime coat can be modified by adding of 5% water, max. 1 l water/25 kg bucket. An excessive dilution of the paint can cause “chalking” of the surface.
products.experts_advice: Before application of Baumit PremiumPrimer, carefully mix, and overall apply on the substrate by a roller or a paintbrush evenly without any interruption. Curing time min. 24 hrs.

products.name: Baumit KlimaWhite
products.description: Natural-white, moisture-regulating lightweight lime plaster with hydraulic binding agent for mechanical processing indoors.
products.experts_advice_2: Research at the Institute for Building Protection IfB (Institut für Bautenschutz) shows the ability of calcium renders to clear pollutants from the air very quickly. All measurements in an experimental room showed that for example the sulphur oxide concentration was lowered to a half within 3 minutes. (Source: COVISS - independent magazine)
products.experts_advice: Sufficient mass volume of the plaster (recommended thickness 2 cm) allows for thermal accumulation and protects the interior from overheating in summer, while radiation of accumulated heat ensures comfortable interior temperatures in the interim or winter period. In addition to insulation render also contributes to create a comfortable interior climate, The ability of render to accumulate heat is not only pleasant but also contributes to savings on the cost of heating and cooling.
products.product_benefit_1_description: The structure of the plaster absorbs moisture from its surroundings and returns it in the event of a decrease in moisture.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Antibacterial effects, reduced risk of mold, and reduced smell due to lime hydrate content.
products.product_benefit_3_description: High permeability supports fast transfer of moisture and prevents condensation.
products.max_thickness: 25 mm per coat (on a new substrate)

headline_t.int: House No. 2 is comparable to Building No. 1 in terms of the wall construction. The biggest difference is the diffusion-open, mineral inner coating that is used there.
headline_t.si: Beton je najpogosteje uporabljen gradbeni material. Betonske hiše imajo zaradi svoje visoke akumulacijske mase odlične lastnosti shranjevanja toplote v kombinaciji s toplotno izolacijo.

text_t.int: This ensured significantly better moisture regulation and contributed to a reduction in moisture peaks. This is due to the moisture penetration coefficient, which was significantly higher for this interior coating than for house No. 1. With regard to overheating in summer, it can be seen that the indoor temperatures in houses 1 and 2 were low in summer, which is due to the external thermal insulation and the high specific building wall masses.
text_t.si: Visoka toplotna kapaciteta ščiti pred poletno vročino. Notranji omet pomeni majhno nihanje temperature notranjih površin. Zaradi notranjega ometa ima hiša 2 večjo sposobnost prevzemanja vlage kot hiša 1. Občutno izboljšanje shranjevanja vlage je bilo v raziskovalnih hišah tudi znanstveno potrjeno.

products.experts_advice_3: Thanks to the white putty, you can easily check whether Baumit OpenContact was actually used on your façade!
products.experts_advice: On account of its good adhesive properties, Baumit OpenContact can be used for gluing (or smoothing) XPS insulating panels. N.B. in this case the high water vapour permeability of the material no longer applies.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Particularly suitable for structures with higher demands for interior quality.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Adhesive mortar for bonding and mortaring insulation panels in the Baumit Open system.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Exceptional quality adhesive mortar, highly flexible and with excellent workability.

seo.title: Baumit openContact
seo.description: Breathable, mineral-based, fibre-reinforced, white powder adhesive and plaster undercoat – specially developed for Baumit Open - KlimaFaçade.

products.name: Baumit KlimaWhite
products.description: Paroprepustni beli lahki apneni omet s sposobnostjo uravnavanja vlažnosti zraka v prostoru, primeren tudi za kopalnice. Naravna struktura mikropor zagotavlja hitro oddajanje in sprejemanje vodne pare in ustvarja optimalno bivalno klimo. Posebej primeren za strojno nanašanje in za zaribane površine. Zrnavost 1 mm.
products.product_benefit_1: uravnava vlago v prostoru, difuzijsko odprt omet
products.product_benefit_3: brez škodljivih snovi, zavira nastanek plesni

seo.title: Baumit KlimaWhite
seo.description: Paroprepustni beli lahki apneni omet s sposobnostjo uravnavanja vlažnosti zraka v prostoru, primeren tudi za kopalnice.

products.name: Baumit StarContact White
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral. Za lepljenje (na mineralnih podlagah) in kot osnovni omet za plošče za podzidek XPS TOP. Primeren tudi kot izravnalna masa za beton.
products.experts_advice_2: V splošnem mora biti nanos lepila takšen, da med ploščo in podlago zrak ne more krožiti in da so plošče v enakomernem kontaktu s podlago po celotni površini, sicer pride do vbočenja ali izbočenja plošč. Poleg tega mora biti pri pri vseh načinih lepljenja lepilo naneseno do roba plošče.
products.experts_advice_3: Za pripravo lahko uporabimo le čisto pitno vodo (iz vodovoda). Voda ne sme biti vroča (največ mlačna na otip). Dodajanje kakršnihkoli dodatkov (npr. proti zmrzovanju, pospeševalci) ni dovoljeno.
products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.

videos.title: Izvedba armirnega sloja izolacijskih plošč iz EPSa
Vgrajevanje izolacijskih plošč iz mineralne volne

seo.title: Baumit StarContact White
seo.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral.

products.name: Baumit openTherm fasadne plošče  open fasadne plošče
products.additional_name: bele paroproustne izolacijske plošče iz EPSa
products.description: Bele paroprepustne fasadne izolacijske plošče na osnovi EPS (ekspandiranega polistirena) po SIST EN 13163 (μ ≤ 10), posebno prilagojene za opečne in podobne paroprepustne zidove; z dobrimi toplotnoizolacijskimi lastnostmi, kot sestavni del fasadnega sistema Baumit open.
products.experts_advice_2: Vogale objektov izoliramo z izmeničnim polaganjem plošč. Izmenično polagamo cele in polovične plošče tako, da se polovičke tesno zaključijo v cele plošče.
products.experts_advice_3: V vogalih odprtin (npr. okna, vrata) je priporočljivo, da vogal odpritne ni na stikih plošč, temveč da sega proti sredini plošče. Izjema so lahko protipožarni pasovi nad okni.
products.experts_advice: Plošče polagamo neposredno po nanosu lepila, da se izognemo tvorjenju kožice na površini lepila. Plošče polagamo z rahlim pomikanjem v obe smeri ter nato pritisnemo na podlago. Polagamo samo cele plošče, tesno od spodaj navzgor, zamikanjem stikov.

seo.title: Baumit openTherm fasadne plošče  open fasadne plošče
seo.description: Bele paroprepustne fasadne izolacijske plošče na osnovi EPS (ekspandiranega polistirena) po SIST EN 13163 (μ ≤ 10).

products.name: Baumit openContact
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo paroprepustno mineralno praškasto lepilo in osnovni omet. Razvito posebej za fasadni sistem Baumit open. Primerno tudi za zelo vlažne in s soljo zelo obremenjene zidove.
products.experts_advice_2: Lepilo nanesemo na izolacijsko ploščo linijsko po vseh robovih in točkovno v sredini. Lamelne plošče lepimo površinsko, kontaktna površina min. 80 %.
products.experts_advice_3: Pred nanosom naslednjih slojev upoštevamo min. 7 dnevni čas sušenja (velja pri temperaturi zraka +20°C in ≤ 70% vlagi), pri čemer je pomembno, da je površina enakomerno suha (brez bolj vlažnih, temnejših lis).
products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.

seo.title: Baumit openContact
seo.description: Naravno belo paroprepustno mineralno praškasto lepilo in osnovni omet. Razvito posebej za fasadni sistem Baumit open.

products.name: Baumit StarTex
products.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje osnovnih ometov v Baumit fasadnih sistemih.
products.experts_advice_2: V sveže nanešeno maso vtisnemo stekleno mrežico Baumit StarTex v navpičnih pasovih od zgoraj navzdol z najmanj 10 cm prekrivanjem in jo poravnamo z ravnim delom gladilke. Mrežica mora biti vsaj 1 mm (na stikih 0,5 mm) in max. 3 mm pokrita z lepilom.
products.experts_advice_3: Če vogale ojačamo z Baumit vogalniki, moramo mrežico vogalnikov v celoti vtopiti v lepilo. Če vogale ojačamo brez vogalnikov, izvedemo to med armiranjem površine. Pri tem mrežico potegnemo vsaj 20 cm preko vogala in jo s 10 cm prekrivanjem vtisnemo v lepilo.
products.experts_advice: Na vogalih oken in drugih odprtin pred nanosom armirnega sloja namestimo dodatne, diagonalno položene pasove steklene mrežice (velikost min. 20 x 30 cm).

seo.title: Baumit StarTex
seo.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje Baumit izravnalnih ometov, kot sestavni del Baumit fasadnih sistemov. Širina odprtin 4 mm.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer

products.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavo vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino. Možnost obarvanja - gl. tehnični list.

seo.title: Baumit PremiumPrimer
seo.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavno vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino.

products.name: Baumit SilikonTop
products.color_text: barvni odtenki s končno številko 2 - 9 po barvni karti Life Colored by Baumit
products.description: Pastozni tankoslojni zaključni omet na osnovi dodatno razvitih silikonskih smol za zunanje površine. Zelo vodoodbojen, visoko paroprepusten, odklonilen za umazanijo in univerzalno uporaben, z izboljšanimi obdelovalnimi lastnostmi.
products.experts_advice_2: Minimalna debelina zaključnega ometa mora biti 1,5 mm, pri žlebičasti strukturi najmanj 2 mm.
products.experts_advice_3: Enakomernost barvnih odtenkov zagotovimo le, če uporabljamo pripravljene barvne omete iz ene proizvodne šarže. Na enakost barve vplivajo tudi: temperatura, vlažnost zraka, vpojnost podlage. Različne šarže pred nanosom medsebojno premešamo.
products.experts_advice: V času nanašanja in sušenja preprečimo vpliv direktnih sončnih žarkov, dežja in močnega vetra, v nasprotnem primeru moramo površine ustrezno zaščititi (npr. uporaba fasadnih mrež).

seo.title: Baumit SilikonTop
seo.description: Pripravljeni pastozni tankoslojni zaključni omet na osnovi dodatno razvitih silikonskih smol za zunanje površine.

products.name: Baumit IonitFino
products.description: Praškasta izravnalna masa, ki aktivno uravnava zračno vlažnost. Primerna za zapolnjevanje stikov in za izdelavo notranjih gladkih površin na mavčno-kartonskih ploščah, ometih in betonu (kakovost površine Q1 - Q4). Za ročno nanašanje. Za novogradnje in prenove. Najboljša v kombinaciji z Baumit IonitColor.
products.min_thickness: 0.1 mm (priporočena debelina > 1,5 mm za optimalno uravnavanje vlažnosti)

buildings.headline: House No. 3 was built with perforated bricks. It has no thermal insulation and therefore does not meet modern building standards.
buildings.text: The heat storage behaviour had only a minor effect due to the lack of insulation. This was also reflected in the strong fluctuations in the wall and indoor temperatures in summer. Due to the low sorption capacity of the interior plaster used, only a low level of moisture buffering was determined in the building.

The very good moisture buffering ability of the plaster is due to the great sorption properties and the diffusion capabilities of the interior coating that is used.

products.description: Unique, high quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar with white cement, especially for Baumit openSystem. Complying, with a high degree of safety, to all parameters required by ETAG 004. Highly vapor permeable, very flexible, extremely resistant to weathering featuring excellent workability. For objects with highest quality demands on indoor climate - for a house that breaths.
products.experts_advice_2: Generally speaking, the Baumit OpenContact system is used for thermal insulation anywhere where a thermal insulation system with a high level of water vapour permeability is required, and thus also for the thermal insulation of porous concrete block walls. We therefore recommend the specific evaluation of the thermal insulation recommendation for thermal insulation for the structure in question and that you take into account the specific type of porous concrete brick. Our colleagues at the Baumit Consultancy Centre will be happy to assist you in this regard.

products.name: Baumit openContact
products.additional_name: Unique, high quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar
products.description: Unique, high quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar with white cement, especially for Baumit openSystem. Complying, with a high degree of safety, to all parameters required by ETAG 004. Highly vapor permeable, very flexible, extremely resistant to weathering featuring excellent workability. For objects with highest quality demands on indoor climate - for a house that breaths.
products.experts_advice_2: Generally speaking, the Baumit OpenContact system is used for thermal insulation anywhere where a thermal insulation system with a high level of water vapour permeability is required, and thus also for the thermal insulation of porous concrete block walls. We therefore recommend the specific evaluation of the thermal insulation recommendation for thermal insulation for the structure in question and that you take into account the specific type of porous concrete brick. Our colleagues at the Baumit Consultancy Centre will be happy to assist you in this regard.
products.experts_advice_3: Thanks to the white putty, you can easily check whether Baumit OpenContact was actually used on your façade!
products.experts_advice: On account of its good adhesive properties, Baumit OpenContact can be used for gluing (or smoothing) XPS insulating panels. N.B. in this case the high water vapour permeability of the material no longer applies.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Particularly suitable for structures with higher demands for interior quality.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Adhesive mortar for bonding and mortaring insulation panels in the Baumit Open system.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Exceptional quality adhesive mortar, highly flexible and with excellent workability.

seo.title: Baumit openContact
seo.description: Breathable, mineral-based, fibre-reinforced, white powder adhesive and plaster undercoat – specially developed for Baumit Open - KlimaFaçade.

products.name: Baumit StarTex
products.additional_name: Alkaline resistant, glass fibre textile mesh to be used in Baumit ETICS.
products.description: Used within the base coat render (reinforcement layer) of ETICS and for strengthening general base coat renders and plasters.
products.experts_advice_2: Red threads, approx. 10 cm from the edge of the textile-glass mesh, enable to the prescribed overlap to be observed - quick, simple and without any measurements.
products.experts_advice: Prerequisite: the textile-glass mesh structure must be fully covered. The textile-glass mesh must be covered by at least 1 mm (in the overlapping area at least 0.5 mm
products.product_benefit_1_description: Part of the thermal insulation systems Baumit Star a Baumit Pro. For strengthening the reinforcement layer.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Fibre-glass mesh resistant to the elements. Premium quality with Baumit applicator.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Wider bands allow les frequent movement of bands which reduces the consumption of the whole matrix.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: Standard colour shade white, dyeing acc. table
products.description: Ready-to-use, universally usable primer to equalize absorption and acts as bonding agent for all Baumit ETIC- and plaster systems. The added grain makes it easier to apply and structure all top coats. Can be colored - see product data sheet for detailed information.
products.experts_advice_2: If necessary, for instance in case of very hot weather, consistency of the prime coat can be modified by adding of 5% water, max. 1 l water/25 kg bucket. An excessive dilution of the paint can cause “chalking” of the surface.
products.experts_advice: Before application of Baumit PremiumPrimer, carefully mix, and overall apply on the substrate by a roller or a paintbrush evenly without any interruption. Curing time min. 24 hrs.

seo.title: Baumit PremiumPrimer
seo.description: Pre-treatment for mineral-based surfaces, as a means of absorption compensation and as a bonding agent for subsequent coating with mineral-based or decorative paste plasters.

products.name: Baumit StarTop
products.description: Highly weather-resistant facade render with silicone binder and new functional filler. The all new Drypor effect guarantees a quick-drying facade surface after rain, fog and condensation.
products.experts_advice_2: New recipe enables the expansion of the assortment of paint color tones. StarTop plaster is available in up to 758 colors, i.e. in all shades of Baumit Life (ending digits 2 through 9), with the exception of the most saturated colors (ending digit 1). Also available in all structures.
products.experts_advice_3: With the hydrophilic capabilities of the render, the surface of your façade will dry out in moist weather far sooner than with regular renders. Hydrophobic characteristics also provide rapid drainage of raindrops from the surface. The combination of both functions keeps the surface dry and also more resistant to dirt and algae.
products.experts_advice: If you’re longing for an absolutely gleaming façade, reach for StarTop render in Life 0019 shade. Special ingredients and pigments ensure whiter shades.
products.product_benefit_1_description: The combination of hydrophilic and hydrophobic characteristics reduces the load of the façade surface due to moisture.
products.product_benefit_2_description: With its rapid drying surface, your façade will be more resistant to dirt and the effects of microorganisms.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Simple application ensures a good result in each of the six structures offered.

videos.title: Application: Baumit StarTop as finishing render
Application: Recessed Plinth Installation Connected to Perimeter Insulation
Application and Texturing of Topcoat Render

seo.title: Baumit StarTop
seo.description: Highly durable, vapour-permeable façade render with silicon adhesive and innovative functional filler providing extremely fast water and air humidity

products.name: Baumit KlimaWhite
products.description: Natural-white, moisture-regulating lightweight lime plaster with hydraulic binding agent for mechanical processing indoors.
products.experts_advice_2: Research at the Institute for Building Protection IfB (Institut für Bautenschutz) shows the ability of calcium renders to clear pollutants from the air very quickly. All measurements in an experimental room showed that for example the sulphur oxide concentration was lowered to a half within 3 minutes. (Source: COVISS - independent magazine)
products.experts_advice: Sufficient mass volume of the plaster (recommended thickness 2 cm) allows for thermal accumulation and protects the interior from overheating in summer, while radiation of accumulated heat ensures comfortable interior temperatures in the interim or winter period. In addition to insulation render also contributes to create a comfortable interior climate, The ability of render to accumulate heat is not only pleasant but also contributes to savings on the cost of heating and cooling.
products.product_benefit_1_description: The structure of the plaster absorbs moisture from its surroundings and returns it in the event of a decrease in moisture.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Antibacterial effects, reduced risk of mold, and reduced smell due to lime hydrate content.
products.product_benefit_3_description: High permeability supports fast transfer of moisture and prevents condensation.
products.max_thickness: 25 mm per coat (on a new substrate)

videos.title: Application: Baumit KlimaWhite & KlimaColor on common masonry

seo.title: Baumit KlimaWhite
seo.description: The natural white lime plaster for exterior and interior use, with a low white cement content. Machine plaster for a pleasant indoor environment. Indoors: sand or smooth over with Baumit Klim

products.description: High-quality, natural mineral paint based on silicate with good processing properties and high coverage. airless sprayable. Available colored in the Baumit Life color shades ending with 7-9.
products.experts_advice: Before applying Baumit KlimaColor we recommend using Baumit KlimaPrimer bonding primer.

products.experts_advice_2: In the area of the base min. We recommend using XPS or EPS Perimeter non-absorbent insulation panels 30 cm over the terrain.
products.experts_advice: For bonding and mortaring we recommend using Baumit OpenContact adhesive mortar.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Insulation panel made from EPS for simple handling and application.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Ideal for insulating masonry with high vapour permability, such as porous concrete.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Part of the Baumit Open thermal insulation system for optimal interior temperature and pleasant living.

headline_t.int: As with House No. 3, Research Huilding No. 4 was built with perforated bricks. However, it has an ETIC system. Mineral, diffusion-open products were used as the interior coating.
headline_t.si: Povprečna toplotna kapaciteta je bila določena pri opečni hiši s toplotno izolacijo in notranjim ometom.

text_t.int: The house was solidly in the middle range in terms of both heat storage behaviour and protection against overheating in summer. The very good moisture buffering ability of the plaster is due to the great sorption properties and the diffusion capabilities of the interior coating that is used.
text_t.si: V procesu raziskav poletnega pregrevanja je bil v hiši 4 izmerjen nivo povprečne temperature in dokazan vpliv notranjega ometa in notranje barve na sposobnost shranjevanja vlage. Dobra sposobnost sprejemanja vlage uporabljenega notranjega ometa je pokazala visoko stopnjo uravnavanja vlage.

parameters.parameter_name: Protection against overheating in the summer
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a higher protection against overheating of the interior in summer.
A higher value means a more stable temperature.
A higher value means the wall can regulate the humidity better.

parameters.parameter_name: Fluctuation of the inner surface temperature
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A lower value means a more balanced indoor temperature feeling.
A higher value means better protection against outdoor noise.
A higher value means better acoustics due to better protection against echo.

parameters.parameter_name: Absorption of high frequency electromagnetic fields
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a better protection against the most common mobile frequencies.
A lower value means less noticeable odour
200 visitors rated the individual research houses according to their subjective feelings and subjective level of comfort
Višja vrednost pomeni večjo zaščito pred pregrevanjem notranjosti poleti.
Višja vrednost pomeni bolj stabilno temperaturo.
Višja vrednost pomeni, da stena bolje uravnava vlago v prostoru.

parameters.parameter_name: Nihanje temperature na površini notranje stene
parameters.parameter_tooltip: Nižja vrednost pomeni bolj uravnotežen občutek temperature v zaprtih prostorih.
Višja vrednost pomeni boljšo zaščito pred zunanjim hrupom.
Višja vrednost pomeni boljšo akustiko.
Višja vrednost pomeni boljšo zaščito pred najpogostejšimi mobilnimi frekvencami.
Nižja vrednost pomeni manj izrazit vonj.
200 obiskovalcev je ocenilo vsako raziskovalno hišo  glede na njihove subjektivne občutke in subjektivno raven udobja.

products.name: Baumit openContact
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo paroprepustno mineralno praškasto lepilo in osnovni omet. Razvito posebej za fasadni sistem Baumit open. Primerno tudi za zelo vlažne in s soljo zelo obremenjene zidove.
products.experts_advice_2: Lepilo nanesemo na izolacijsko ploščo linijsko po vseh robovih in točkovno v sredini. Lamelne plošče lepimo površinsko, kontaktna površina min. 80 %.
products.experts_advice_3: Pred nanosom naslednjih slojev upoštevamo min. 7 dnevni čas sušenja (velja pri temperaturi zraka +20°C in ≤ 70% vlagi), pri čemer je pomembno, da je površina enakomerno suha (brez bolj vlažnih, temnejših lis).
products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.

seo.title: Baumit openContact
seo.description: Naravno belo paroprepustno mineralno praškasto lepilo in osnovni omet. Razvito posebej za fasadni sistem Baumit open.

products.name: Baumit openTherm fasadne plošče  open fasadne plošče
products.additional_name: bele paroproustne izolacijske plošče iz EPSa
products.description: Bele paroprepustne fasadne izolacijske plošče na osnovi EPS (ekspandiranega polistirena) po SIST EN 13163 (μ ≤ 10), posebno prilagojene za opečne in podobne paroprepustne zidove; z dobrimi toplotnoizolacijskimi lastnostmi, kot sestavni del fasadnega sistema Baumit open.
products.experts_advice_2: Vogale objektov izoliramo z izmeničnim polaganjem plošč. Izmenično polagamo cele in polovične plošče tako, da se polovičke tesno zaključijo v cele plošče.
products.experts_advice_3: V vogalih odprtin (npr. okna, vrata) je priporočljivo, da vogal odpritne ni na stikih plošč, temveč da sega proti sredini plošče. Izjema so lahko protipožarni pasovi nad okni.
products.experts_advice: Plošče polagamo neposredno po nanosu lepila, da se izognemo tvorjenju kožice na površini lepila. Plošče polagamo z rahlim pomikanjem v obe smeri ter nato pritisnemo na podlago. Polagamo samo cele plošče, tesno od spodaj navzgor, zamikanjem stikov.

seo.title: Baumit openTherm fasadne plošče  open fasadne plošče
seo.description: Bele paroprepustne fasadne izolacijske plošče na osnovi EPS (ekspandiranega polistirena) po SIST EN 13163 (μ ≤ 10).

products.name: Baumit StarTex
products.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje osnovnih ometov v Baumit fasadnih sistemih.
products.experts_advice_2: V sveže nanešeno maso vtisnemo stekleno mrežico Baumit StarTex v navpičnih pasovih od zgoraj navzdol z najmanj 10 cm prekrivanjem in jo poravnamo z ravnim delom gladilke. Mrežica mora biti vsaj 1 mm (na stikih 0,5 mm) in max. 3 mm pokrita z lepilom.
products.experts_advice_3: Če vogale ojačamo z Baumit vogalniki, moramo mrežico vogalnikov v celoti vtopiti v lepilo. Če vogale ojačamo brez vogalnikov, izvedemo to med armiranjem površine. Pri tem mrežico potegnemo vsaj 20 cm preko vogala in jo s 10 cm prekrivanjem vtisnemo v lepilo.
products.experts_advice: Na vogalih oken in drugih odprtin pred nanosom armirnega sloja namestimo dodatne, diagonalno položene pasove steklene mrežice (velikost min. 20 x 30 cm).

seo.title: Baumit StarTex
seo.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje Baumit izravnalnih ometov, kot sestavni del Baumit fasadnih sistemov. Širina odprtin 4 mm.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: standardni beli barvni ton; 17 PremiumPrimer odtenkov po Life barvni karti
products.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavo vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino. Možnost obarvanja - gl. tehnični list.

seo.title: Baumit PremiumPrimer
seo.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavno vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino.

products.name: Baumit StarTop
products.color_text: barvni odtenki s končno številko 2 - 9 po barvni karti Life Colored by Baumit
products.description: Vremensko zelo odporen pastozni zaključni omet s silikonskim vezivom in novim funkcionalnim polnilom za hitro sušenje fasadne površine po dežju, megli in kondenzaciji.
products.experts_advice_2: Pri barvnih odtenkih s TSR-vrednostjo 20 – 24 je uporaba mogoča na debeloslojnem osnovnem ometu (≥ 5 mm) ali na Baumit PowerFlex (3 – 4 mm).
products.experts_advice_3: Barvni odtenki s končno številko 2 - 9 po barvni karti Life Colored by Baumit.
products.experts_advice: Temperatura zraka, podlage in materiala mora biti v času med nanašanjem in vezanjem nad + 5ºC.
products.product_benefit_2: boljša zaščita proti algam in plesnim

seo.title: Baumit StarTop
seo.description: Vremensko zelo odporen pastozni zaključni omet s silikonskim vezivom in polnilom za hitro sušenje fasadne površine po dežju, megli in kondenzaciji.

products.name: Baumit KlimaWhite
products.description: Paroprepustni beli lahki apneni omet s sposobnostjo uravnavanja vlažnosti zraka v prostoru, primeren tudi za kopalnice. Naravna struktura mikropor zagotavlja hitro oddajanje in sprejemanje vodne pare in ustvarja optimalno bivalno klimo. Posebej primeren za strojno nanašanje in za zaribane površine. Zrnavost 1 mm.
products.product_benefit_1: uravnava vlago v prostoru, difuzijsko odprt omet
products.product_benefit_3: brez škodljivih snovi, zavira nastanek plesni

seo.title: Baumit KlimaWhite
seo.description: Paroprepustni beli lahki apneni omet s sposobnostjo uravnavanja vlažnosti zraka v prostoru, primeren tudi za kopalnice.

products.name: Baumit KlimaColor
products.color_text: barvni odtenki s končno številko 7 - 9 po barvni karti Life Colored by Baumit
products.description: Visokovredna naravna mineralna barva na osnovi silikatov z dobrimi obdelovalnimi lastnostmi in visoko pokrivnostjo. Nanašanje: z valjčkom, s čopičem ali brizganjem. Zelo paroprepustna, v E.L.F. kakovosti, brez vonja med sušenjem, preizkušena glede vsebnosti škodljivih snovi. Barve: Life colored by Baumit - odtenki s končno številko 7 - 9.

seo.title: Baumit KlimaColor
seo.description: Visokovredna naravna mineralna barva na osnovi silikatov z dobrimi obdelovalnimi lastnostmi in visoko pokrivnostjo.

products.name: Baumit StarContact white
products.additional_name: Top quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar
products.description: Top quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar with white cement, especially for Baumit StarSystems. Complying, with a high degree of safety, to all parameters required by ETAG 004. Very flexible, extremely weather-resistant, with excellent workability, guaranteeing long lasting performance. Formulated for demanding applications, weather conditions during processing and demanding substrates.
products.experts_advice_2: Create the reinforcement layer by applying 10 mm adhesive mortar with a notched trowel to the substrate. Press vertical strips of Baumit StarTex fibre-glass mesh into the fresh mortar with 10 cm overlap and then (or after applying additional material) smooth the surface. The reinforcement must not be visible. Reinforcement layer thickness min. 3 mm, max. 6 mm.
products.experts_advice: Baumit StarContact adhesive mortar can also be used for bonding and mortaring plinth XPS and EPS Perimeter insulation panels.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Highly flexible cement adhesive mortar suitable for bonding and mortaring all insulation panels.
products.product_benefit_2_description: The façade plaster can be applied directly on the reinforced layer.
products.product_benefit_3_description: With excellent applicability, with guaranteed long life and rapid curing period.
products.sd_value: app. 0.15 m for a layer thickness of 3 mm

videos.title: Application: Installing Anchors on Mineral Wool Insulation

seo.title: Baumit StarContact white
seo.description: Adhesive and reinforcement mortar for Baumit Open Façade boards, Baumit Open Façade boards sound insulation, Baumit Reflect Façade boards and Baumit Reflect sound-insulating façade boards. (r

products.name: Baumit StarTherm Resolution
products.additional_name: Facade insulation board with extremely high thermal insulation
products.description: Facade insulation board with extremely high thermal insulation capabilities. Phenolic foam based core covered on both sides with 3mm thick grey EPS-F. Offers the possibility to grind the surface of the board to equalize any unevenness during installation. Especially for window openings, etc. Thickness 50 - 300 mm. Both sides covered with grey EPS-F.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Even small thicknesses of insulation ensure high thermal insulation properties, and also save the space.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Ideal at insulations where high thicknesses of common insulation are considered.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Effective thicknesses of insulation do not increase the thickness of window reveal, and so more light gets inside.

seo.description: Façade insulating panels made of phenolic foam according to EN 13166 with best thermal insulation properties, laminated on both sides with EPS-F plus. Board size: 500 x 1000 mm Thermal conduc

seo.description: Adhesive and reinforcement mortar for Baumit Open Façade boards, Baumit Open Façade boards sound insulation, Baumit Reflect Façade boards and Baumit Reflect sound-insulating façade boards. (r

products.name: Baumit StarTex
products.additional_name: Alkaline resistant, glass fibre textile mesh to be used in Baumit ETICS.
products.description: Used within the base coat render (reinforcement layer) of ETICS and for strengthening general base coat renders and plasters.
products.experts_advice_2: Red threads, approx. 10 cm from the edge of the textile-glass mesh, enable to the prescribed overlap to be observed - quick, simple and without any measurements.
products.experts_advice: Prerequisite: the textile-glass mesh structure must be fully covered. The textile-glass mesh must be covered by at least 1 mm (in the overlapping area at least 0.5 mm
products.product_benefit_1_description: Part of the thermal insulation systems Baumit Star a Baumit Pro. For strengthening the reinforcement layer.
products.product_benefit_2_description: Fibre-glass mesh resistant to the elements. Premium quality with Baumit applicator.
products.product_benefit_3_description: Wider bands allow les frequent movement of bands which reduces the consumption of the whole matrix.

Application: ETICS Connection to Flush Window
Application: Plinth Installation Finishing on Ground Level
Application: Recessed Plinth Installation Connected to Perimeter Insulation
Repair plaster cracks bigger than 0,5mm Baumit CrackSystem

seo.title: Baumit StarTex
seo.description: Used within the base coat render (reinforcement layer) of ETICS and for strengthening general base coat renders and plasters.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: Standard colour shade white, dyeing acc. table
products.description: Ready-to-use, universally usable primer to equalize absorption and acts as bonding agent for all Baumit ETIC- and plaster systems. The added grain makes it easier to apply and structure all top coats. Can be colored - see product data sheet for detailed information.
products.experts_advice_2: If necessary, for instance in case of very hot weather, consistency of the prime coat can be modified by adding of 5% water, max. 1 l water/25 kg bucket. An excessive dilution of the paint can cause “chalking” of the surface.
products.experts_advice: Before application of Baumit PremiumPrimer, carefully mix, and overall apply on the substrate by a roller or a paintbrush evenly without any interruption. Curing time min. 24 hrs.

videos.title: Application: Recessed Plinth Installation Connected to Perimeter Insulation
Application: Baumit StarTop as finishing render

seo.title: Baumit PremiumPrimer
seo.description: Pre-treatment for mineral-based surfaces, as a means of absorption compensation and as a bonding agent for subsequent coating with mineral-based or decorative paste plasters.

products.name: Baumit CreativTop
products.description: Ready-to-use, highly weather-resistant, silicone-reinforced finishing render with a new, functional filler for quick re-drying facade surfaces after rain, fog and condensation. Modelable render for a creative exterior facade design. For manual or machine application.
products.experts_advice_2: The individual appearance of your façade or room does not just come down to colour. Put some thought into it, be creative and give the wall any conceivable texture, with CreativTop in Max, Trend and Fine granularities, which can be freely molded.
products.experts_advice: Tip: at www.baumit.com you can find some design suggestions and you also have unlimited options when it comes to designing new textures.
products.sd_value: 0.07 m - 0.08 m for a layer thickness of 2 mm

seo.title: Baumit CreativTop
seo.description: Design and protection of façades on top of old and new mineral plasters and putties, on concrete, for the re-working of organic putties and plasters, as a final coating with Baumit ETICS syst

products.name: Baumit StarColor
products.description: Highly weather-resistant facade paint with silicone binder and new functional filler. The all new Drypor effect guarantees a quick-drying facade surface after rain, fog and condensation.
products.experts_advice_2: If the substrate releases sand, absorbs water or is uneven, we recommend using the Baumit deep substrate as the prime coat. After the 12-hours curing time, apply the top coat Baumit StarColor. If necessary, it can be diluted with max. 5% water.
products.experts_advice: The prime coat is made by dilution of paint with 10 to 15 % of water. After drying for app. 12 hours, 1 to 2 top undiluted coats are applied. Consistency can be modified, if necessary, by adding of max. 5% water.
products.gloss_level: G3 matt according to DIN EN 1062-1

videos.title: Repair plaster cracks bigger than 0,5mm Baumit CrackSystem
Repair plaster cracks smaller than 0,5mm Baumit Paint System

seo.title: Baumit StarColor
seo.description: Baumit StarColor is a high quality, ready-to-use premium silicone resin facade paint with high opacity and excellent processing properties. Baumit StarColor is extremely water repellent and t

products.name: Baumit StarContact White
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral. Za lepljenje (na mineralnih podlagah) in kot osnovni omet za plošče za podzidek XPS TOP. Primeren tudi kot izravnalna masa za beton.
products.experts_advice_2: V splošnem mora biti nanos lepila takšen, da med ploščo in podlago zrak ne more krožiti in da so plošče v enakomernem kontaktu s podlago po celotni površini, sicer pride do vbočenja ali izbočenja plošč. Poleg tega mora biti pri pri vseh načinih lepljenja lepilo naneseno do roba plošče.
products.experts_advice_3: Za pripravo lahko uporabimo le čisto pitno vodo (iz vodovoda). Voda ne sme biti vroča (največ mlačna na otip). Dodajanje kakršnihkoli dodatkov (npr. proti zmrzovanju, pospeševalci) ni dovoljeno.
products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.

videos.title: Izvedba armirnega sloja izolacijskih plošč iz EPSa
Vgrajevanje izolacijskih plošč iz mineralne volne

seo.title: Baumit StarContact White
seo.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral.

products.name: Baumit StarTherm XS 022  fasadne plošče XS 022
products.additional_name: izolacijske plošče iz penjenih smol PF
products.description: Fasadne izolacijske plošče iz PF (penjenih fenolnih smol) po SIST EN 13166, z najboljšimi toplotnoizolacijskimi lastnostmi, obojestransko kaširane s filcem iz steklenih vlaken. Sestavni del fasadnega sistema Baumit Star Resolution.
products.experts_advice_2: Nazivna debelina osnovnega ometa mora biti vsaj 5 mm (skupna debelina izravnalnega in armirnega sloja 7 - 8 mm), pri čemer je armirna mrežica vtisnjena v zunanjo tretjino lepila.
products.experts_advice_3: Pri izolaciji špalet oken in vrat morajo plošče na fasadi toliko segati preko roba zidu, da je po strditvi lepila možno tesno prileganje na stiku izolacije na špaleti.
products.experts_advice: Področja uporabe: prenove, novogradnje, stavbe do višine 22 m, zunanji zid, kletni strop. Idealen za: mansarde, dozidave, nizko-energijske hiše, špalete, lože, frčade.

seo.title: Baumit StarTherm XS 022  fasadne plošče XS 022
seo.description: Fasadne izolacijske plošče iz PF (penjenih fenolnih smol) po SIST EN 13166, z najboljšimi toplotnoizolacijskimi lastnostmi, obojestransko kaširane s filcem iz steklenih vlaken.

products.name: Baumit StarContact White
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral. Za lepljenje (na mineralnih podlagah) in kot osnovni omet za plošče za podzidek XPS TOP. Primeren tudi kot izravnalna masa za beton.
products.experts_advice_2: V splošnem mora biti nanos lepila takšen, da med ploščo in podlago zrak ne more krožiti in da so plošče v enakomernem kontaktu s podlago po celotni površini, sicer pride do vbočenja ali izbočenja plošč. Poleg tega mora biti pri pri vseh načinih lepljenja lepilo naneseno do roba plošče.

products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.

videos.title: Izvedba armirnega sloja izolacijskih plošč iz EPSa
Vgrajevanje izolacijskih plošč iz mineralne volne

seo.title: Baumit StarContact White
seo.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral.

products.name: Baumit StarTex
products.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje osnovnih ometov v Baumit fasadnih sistemih.
products.experts_advice_2: V sveže nanešeno maso vtisnemo stekleno mrežico Baumit StarTex v navpičnih pasovih od zgoraj navzdol z najmanj 10 cm prekrivanjem in jo poravnamo z ravnim delom gladilke. Mrežica mora biti vsaj 1 mm (na stikih 0,5 mm) in max. 3 mm pokrita z lepilom.
products.experts_advice_3: Če vogale ojačamo z Baumit vogalniki, moramo mrežico vogalnikov v celoti vtopiti v lepilo. Če vogale ojačamo brez vogalnikov, izvedemo to med armiranjem površine. Pri tem mrežico potegnemo vsaj 20 cm preko vogala in jo s 10 cm prekrivanjem vtisnemo v lepilo.
products.experts_advice: Na vogalih oken in drugih odprtin pred nanosom armirnega sloja namestimo dodatne, diagonalno položene pasove steklene mrežice (velikost min. 20 x 30 cm).

seo.title: Baumit StarTex
seo.description: Alkalno obstojna armirna mrežica iz steklenih vlaken za armiranje Baumit izravnalnih ometov, kot sestavni del Baumit fasadnih sistemov. Širina odprtin 4 mm.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: standardni beli barvni ton; 17 PremiumPrimer odtenkov po Life barvni karti
products.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavo vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino. Možnost obarvanja - gl. tehnični list.

seo.title: Baumit PremiumPrimer
seo.description: Univerzalni paroprepustni osnovni premaz za izravnavno vpojnosti in izboljšanje oprijema. Posebno polnilo omogoča boljše nanašanje in lepšo zaribano površino.

products.name: Baumit CreativTop
products.color_text: Baumit CreativTop Max, Trend, Vario, Fine, Pearl po Baumit Life barvni karti. Baumit CreativTop Silk pa v Life 0019 (bela)
products.description: Vremensko zelo odporen pastozni zaključni omet s silikonskim vezivom in novim funkcionalnim polnilom za hitro sušenje fasadne površine po dežju, megli in kondenzaciji. Modelirni omet za kreativno obdelavo fasad. Za ročno in strojno nanašanje.
products.experts_advice_2: Enakomernost barvnih odtenkov zagotovimo le, če uporabljamo pripravljene barvne omete iz ene proizvodne šarže. Na enakost barve vplivajo tudi: temperatura, vlažnost zraka, vpojnost podlage. Različne šarže pred nanosom medsebojno premešamo.
products.experts_advice_3: Minimalna debelina zaključnega ometa mora biti 1,5 mm. Če želimo finejšo strukturo površine zaključnega ometa, je potrebno pri ometih z zrnavostjo pod 1,5 mm (CreativTop Fine, CreativTop Pearl in CreativTop Silk) omet nanesti v več slojih.
products.experts_advice: Zunanje stene ne izražajo individualnosti zgolj z barvo, ampak se ta začuti tudi s strukturo. S šestimi različnimi zrnavostmi od Max do Silk lahko to dosežemo.

seo.title: Baumit CreativTop
seo.description: Pripravljeni pastozni modelirni s silikonskimi vlakni ojačan zunanji omet za kreativno obdelavo fasad.

products.name: Baumit StarColor
products.color_text: po barvni karti Life colored by Baumit
products.description: Vremensko zelo odporna fasadna barva s silikonskim vezivom in novim funkcionalnim polnilom za hitro sušenje površine po dežju, megli in kondenzaciji.
products.product_benefit_2: boljša zaščita proti algam in plesnim

seo.title: Baumit StarColor
seo.description: Visokovredna pripravljena premium fasadna barva na osnovi silikonskih smol z dobro pokrivnostjo in izjemnimi obdelovalnimi lastnostmi.

buildings.headline: House No. 6 was built with a timber frame construction with plasterboard and has external insulation.
buildings.text: The low storage mass of the wall material led to high fluctuations in the wall surface and indoor temperatures and thus to low protection from overheating. The simultaneous low moisture buffer effect resulted from the low sorption capacity of the wall interior coating and the construction-related breathable membrane.

parameters.parameter_name: Protection against overheating in the summer
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a higher protection against overheating of the interior in summer.
A higher value means a more stable temperature.
A higher value means the wall can regulate the humidity better.

parameters.parameter_name: Fluctuation of the inner surface temperature
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A lower value means a more balanced indoor temperature feeling.
A higher value means better protection against outdoor noise.
A higher value means better acoustics due to better protection against echo.

parameters.parameter_name: Absorption of high frequency electromagnetic fields
parameters.parameter_tooltip: A higher value means a better protection against the most common mobile frequencies.
A lower value means less noticeable odour
200 visitors rated the individual research houses according to their subjective feelings and subjective level of comfort

products.name: Baumit StarContact white
products.additional_name: Top quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar
products.description: Top quality adhesive and reinforcing mortar with white cement, especially for Baumit StarSystems. Complying, with a high degree of safety, to all parameters required by ETAG 004. Very flexible, extremely weather-resistant, with excellent workability, guaranteeing long lasting performance. Formulated for demanding applications, weather conditions during processing and demanding substrates.
products.experts_advice_2: Create the reinforcement layer by applying 10 mm adhesive mortar with a notched trowel to the substrate. Press vertical strips of Baumit StarTex fibre-glass mesh into the fresh mortar with 10 cm overlap and then (or after applying additional material) smooth the surface. The reinforcement must not be visible. Reinforcement layer thickness min. 3 mm, max. 6 mm.
products.experts_advice: Baumit StarContact adhesive mortar can also be used for bonding and mortaring plinth XPS and EPS Perimeter insulation panels.
products.product_benefit_1_description: Highly flexible cement adhesive mortar suitable for bonding and mortaring all insulation panels.
products.product_benefit_2_description: The façade plaster can be applied directly on the reinforced layer.
products.product_benefit_3_description: With excellent applicability, with guaranteed long life and rapid curing period.
products.sd_value: app. 0.15 m for a layer thickness of 3 mm

products.additional_name: Alkaline resistant, glass fibre textile mesh to be used in Baumit ETICS.
products.description: Used within the base coat render (reinforcement layer) of ETICS and for strengthening general base coat renders and plasters.
products.experts_advice_2: Red threads, approx. 10 cm from the edge of the textile-glass mesh, enable to the prescribed overlap to be observed - quick, simple and without any measurements.
products.experts_advice: Prerequisite: the textile-glass mesh structure must be fully covered. The textile-glass mesh must be covered by at least 1 mm (in the overlapping area at least 0.5 mm

products.product_benefit_2_description: Fibre-glass mesh resistant to the elements. Premium quality with Baumit applicator.

products.name: Baumit PremiumPrimer
products.color_text: Standard colour shade white, dyeing acc. table
products.description: Ready-to-use, universally usable primer to equalize absorption and acts as bonding agent for all Baumit ETIC- and plaster systems. The added grain makes it easier to apply and structure all top coats. Can be colored - see product data sheet for detailed information.
products.experts_advice_2: If necessary, for instance in case of very hot weather, consistency of the prime coat can be modified by adding of 5% water, max. 1 l water/25 kg bucket. An excessive dilution of the paint can cause “chalking” of the surface.
products.experts_advice: Before application of Baumit PremiumPrimer, carefully mix, and overall apply on the substrate by a roller or a paintbrush evenly without any interruption. Curing time min. 24 hrs.

seo.description: Pre-treatment for mineral-based surfaces, as a means of absorption compensation and as a bonding agent for subsequent coating with mineral-based or decorative paste plasters.

products.name: Baumit CreativTop
products.description: Ready-to-use, highly weather-resistant, silicone-reinforced finishing render with a new, functional filler for quick re-drying facade surfaces after rain, fog and condensation. Modelable render for a creative exterior facade design. For manual or machine application.
products.experts_advice_2: The individual appearance of your façade or room does not just come down to colour. Put some thought into it, be creative and give the wall any conceivable texture, with CreativTop in Max, Trend and Fine granularities, which can be freely molded.
products.experts_advice: Tip: at www.baumit.com you can find some design suggestions and you also have unlimited options when it comes to designing new textures.
products.sd_value: 0.07 m - 0.08 m for a layer thickness of 2 mm

seo.title: Baumit CreativTop
seo.description: Design and protection of façades on top of old and new mineral plasters and putties, on concrete, for the re-working of organic putties and plasters, as a final coating with Baumit ETICS syst

products.name: Baumit StarColor
products.description: Highly weather-resistant facade paint with silicone binder and new functional filler. The all new Drypor effect guarantees a quick-drying facade surface after rain, fog and condensation.
products.experts_advice_2: If the substrate releases sand, absorbs water or is uneven, we recommend using the Baumit deep substrate as the prime coat. After the 12-hours curing time, apply the top coat Baumit StarColor. If necessary, it can be diluted with max. 5% water.
products.experts_advice: The prime coat is made by dilution of paint with 10 to 15 % of water. After drying for app. 12 hours, 1 to 2 top undiluted coats are applied. Consistency can be modified, if necessary, by adding of max. 5% water.
products.gloss_level: G3 matt according to DIN EN 1062-1

products.name: Baumit Divina Classic
products.description: Interior paint with good processing properties and good coverage. Processing: roller, brush, airless spray. Breathable, odorless drying, tested for  harmful substances. Available colored in the Baumit Life shades with the last digit 7, 8 and 9. Wet abrasion class: 3; Opacity: 2 at 7 m² / l; Degree  of gloss: dull matt. 1 liter ≙ approx. 1.6 kilograms.
products.experts_advice_2: Store securely sealed and in a cool and frost-free location. Can be stored unopened, in the original container, for 12 months.
products.experts_advice: Baumit Divina Classic may, in keeping with the coating build-up, be dilluted with water up to a maximum of 5%.

headline_t.int: House No. 6 was built with a timber frame construction with plasterboard and has external insulation.
headline_t.si: Hiša 6 je hiša z leseno konstrukcijo z nizko specifično težo.

text_t.int: The low storage mass of the wall material led to high fluctuations in the wall surface and indoor temperatures and thus to low protection from overheating. The simultaneous low moisture buffer effect resulted from the low sorption capacity of the wall interior coating and the construction-related breathable membrane.
text_t.si: Uporabljeni zaključni premaz ima nizko sposobnost sprejemanja vodne pare. Nizka masa zidov se odraža v visokem nihanju sobne temperature in nizki zaščiti pred poletnim pregrevanjem. Sočasni učinek nizke sposobnosti uravnavanja vlage je posledica slabe vpojnosti notranjih slojev stene in potrebne parne zapore.

products.name: Baumit StarContact White
products.color_text: bela
products.description: Naravno belo mineralno praškasto lepilo na cementni osnovi za uporabo v fasadnih sistemih Baumit Star EPS in Star Mineral. Za lepljenje (na mineralnih podlagah) in kot osnovni omet za plošče za podzidek XPS TOP. Primeren tudi kot izravnalna masa za beton.
products.experts_advice_2: V splošnem mora biti nanos lepila takšen, da med ploščo in podlago zrak ne more krožiti in da so plošče v enakomernem kontaktu s podlago po celotni površini, sicer pride do vbočenja ali izbočenja plošč. Poleg tega mora biti pri pri vseh načinih lepljenja lepilo naneseno do roba plošče.
products.experts_advice_3: Za pripravo lahko uporabimo le čisto pitno vodo (iz vodovoda). Voda ne sme biti vroča (največ mlačna na otip). Dodajanje kakršnihkoli dodatkov (npr. proti zmrzovanju, pospeševalci) ni dovoljeno.
products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.

videos.title: Izvedba armirnega sloja izolacijskih plošč iz EPSa
Vgrajevanje izolacijskih plošč iz mineralne volne

products.experts_advice: Podlaga mora biti čista, suha, nezmrznjena, odprašena, vpojna, nosilna, brez cvetenja, maščob in prostih delcev.
